content: @Saul Kravitz @Pete Krautscheid Canary for some reason added the extra space in the race text. We send as "Asian Indian" but Canary interprets as "Asian India" with an extra space in the middle. Mandelyn-Patel.json image.png
Thanks @Eric Trinh (Genesis), we'll look at this issue as well; we're tracking it as NVSS-265
This has been addressed (via https://github.com/nightingaleproject/vrdr-dotnet/pull/166) and the fix will be in the next Canary release.
